imdb.plot outline: Kathy Haydn is the most recognizable celebrity in Britain. Her face adorns every billboard and magazine cover and with her ground breaking television chat show, award winning books, celebrated clothing range and chart topping music she is a woman that has it all; fame, fortune, looks and the world at her feet. On March 14th her producers had scheduled a very special show in her honor; a celebratory broadcast of 'The Real Kathy Haydn Show' going out live to the nation. So important was this landmark television spectacular that it made front page news - the country were poised to say thank you to this media icon who loved her public and who loved her in return. But Kathy never showed up to the studios. In fact, Kathy vanished without trace
imdb.title: The Real Kathy Haydn
plot: Kathy Haydn is the most recognizable celebrity in Britain. Her face adorns every billboard and magazine cover and with her ground breaking television chat show, award winning books, celebrated clothing range and chart topping music she is a woman that has it all; fame, fortune, looks and the world at her feet. On March 14th her producers had scheduled a very special show in her honor; a celebratory broadcast of '_The Real Kathy Haydn_ (qv) Show' going out live to the nation. So important was this landmark television spectacular that it made front page news - the country were poised to say thank you to this media icon who loved her public and who loved her in return. But Kathy never showed up to the studios. In fact, Kathy vanished without trace::chris
